channel.title: maGaming RSS Feed - kotaku_com
channel.description: A cleaned-up version of the original gaming feed for kotaku_com

item.title: Could Tears Of The Kingdom‚Äôs Best Ability Be The Key To The Next Zelda Game?
item.content:encoded:
Will we ever get a new Deus Ex? Could Ascend be the mechanical centerpiece of the next Zelda? And can speedrunning wash away all the bad sulfates still swimming around in our systems from 2025? It‚Äôs the latest edition of Morning Checkpoint, brought to you from my in-laws‚Äô basement in western PA where the wind chill has temps near zero. I‚Äôm currently blogging with an original Xbox to my right and the Sega Genesis version of Shaq Fu to my left. I am trying to put the finishing touches on my January backlog plans. They include getting at least one of the Celestial weapons in Final Fantasy X.

The most obnoxious way to beat an ultra-hard Clair Obscur boss

It took Reddit user Recordbreaks 10,545 successful parries to beat the RPG‚Äôs new Duolistest boss from the recent free update, IGN reports. The whole thing took over eight hours to complete, including one short break.

‚ÄúOnly reason it took me this long is because I haven‚Äôt properly built Verso for damage in the millions yet,‚Äù Recordbreaks wrote. ‚ÄúHe was doing maybe 200,000 damage per hit and that‚Äôs if Roulette was working in my favor which it wasn‚Äôt most of the time.‚Äù

Don‚Äôt expect a new Deus Ex in 2026

‚Ä¶.no Deus Ex because the people in charge are psychopaths.

‚Äî Elias Toufexis (@EliasToufexis) January 1, 2026

The voice of Adam Jensen, Elias Toufexis, recently previewed his upcoming projects for 2026, including three mystery games. ‚ÄúNo Deus Ex because the people in charge are psychopaths,‚Äù he added to cut off fan speculation. A new game in the sci-fi franchise was reportedly cancelled back in 2024 amid a wave of layoffs at Eidos Montreal.

A neat idea for the next Zelda game

Xboxera cofounder Nick ‚ÄòShpeshal Nick‚Äô Baker shared an alleged rumor about the next mainline Zelda game for Switch 2 on a recent crossover podcast with Giant Bomb‚Äòs Jeff Grubb. Whether it‚Äôs accurate or not (I‚Äôm prone to disbelieve any Nintendo-related rumor unless it‚Äôs a multi-sourced report or comes from a supply chain warehouse), it still makes for a neat concept.

Baker suggests the next Zelda will revolve around dimensional shifting using tears to transport between worlds. The mechanic would impact puzzle solving and other parts of the game, which would carry over a lot of the open-world concepts from BotW and TotK. It might be fan fiction, but it would also make for a neat-sounding game.

I can totally imagine Nintendo taking the Ascend ability from the last game, which began life essentially as a development cheat code, and creating a whole game around it. Whatever the next Zelda ends up being, it‚Äôs probably still years away.

Awesome Games Done Quick 2026 is right around the corner

New year, new Shout üòé

See you soon, #AGDQ2026 pic.twitter.com/eJ0gqClcWr

‚Äî Games Done Quick (@GamesDoneQuick) January 2, 2026

The annual winter speedrunning marathon kicks-off on January 4 at 12:00 p.m. ET with Super Mario Sunshine. The week-long event will feature first-time appearances by new games like Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, Split Fiction, and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33. You can find the full schedule for AGDQ 2026 here, with VOD uploads on YouTube and livestreams on Twitch.

The big-budget John Wick video game adaptation is still on track

Lionsgate chairman Adam Fogelson recently hinted at an AAA John Wick game coming ‚Äúsoon,‚Äù but the company apparently has other licensed spin-offs in the works as well. Those include a Saw game and ‚Äúsome others that we‚Äôll be announcing soon.‚Äù Maybe we‚Äôll see them in an upcoming PlayStation showcase or at Summer Game Fest 2026.

ICYMI:

  • Someone made The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild playable in VR
  • A bunch of 2025‚Äôs biggest PS5 games are on sale right now
  • Carolyn‚Äôs top games of the year (and the ones that didn‚Äôt make the cut)

Watch this:



https://kotaku.com/zelda-switch-2-totk-botw-rumor-leak-2000656436

item.title: Samsung 34‚Äù Monitor Restocks at Its Lowest Price, ViewFinity S50GC Series Gets 40% Off for a Limited Time
item.content:encoded:
Whether you‚Äôre setting up a great home office or just need a computer space for you or the family, a reliable monitor is absolutely necessary. They can get quite pricey, but here‚Äôs the good news: you don‚Äôt have to take out a second mortgage to get one. Not when there are great deals like the one we found on the Samsung 34‚Ä≥ ViewFinity S50GC.

Act fast and you can get the Samsung 34‚Ä≥ ViewFinity S50GC on Amazon for only $196.99, down from $329.99 (a $133 discount or approximately 40% off). A monitor of this build and size for under $200 is a steal, and that‚Äôs why we‚Äôre bringing it to you today.

See at Amazon

An ultrawide monitor that can level up your work or gaming space

This ultra-wide curved monitor makes for a super-immersive viewing experience with detailed images, and additional screen space for gamers, streamers, and casual users. It gives you a panoramic view of the screen, which means you feel more like you‚Äôre in the game or more readily able to engage with what‚Äôs on there. You can edit preadsheets, browsing websites, or watch shows or movies while multitasking, too.

The 34‚Ä≥ ViewFinity S50GC display produces high-resolution visual displays in Ultra Wide Quad HD resolutions, resulting in extremely defined text, photos, videos and gameplay visuals. Therefore, this monitor can produce excellent results for both creative professionals and consumers alike who utilize their monitors for consuming content, productivity and other uses.

It‚Äôll also fit your decor too, if that‚Äôs something you care about. The slim, borderless style is modern and clean and doesn‚Äôt take up a ton of desk space, even though it‚Äôs super wide. So no matter what kind of setup you have at home, it should do a good job of fitting in. Since it has all the connections you might need, you shouldn‚Äôt have any issues getting it ready to go when you get it out of the box, either.

Quickly switching between source inputs is also possible, which makes for some serious versatility. If you have a monitor hooked up but also need to do something with another display or TV, you‚Äôve got that option. That‚Äôs a good deal if you have a lot to take care of at once

The Samsung 34‚Ä≥ ViewFinity S50GC is a high-quality monitor at a reasonable price point for virtually anyone who is seeking a flexible, immersive, and high-performance monitor. It‚Äôs a solid option for anyone who wants a larger monitor in general, and it‚Äôs a top performer you shouldn‚Äôt have to replace for quite some time, as long as you treat it well. Because everyone deserves a good monitor.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/samsung-34-monitor-restocks-at-its-lowest-price-viewfinity-s50gc-series-gets-40-off-for-a-limited-time-2000656367

item.title: Fans Call The Stranger Things Finale A Game Of Thrones Ending For A New Generation
item.content:encoded:
Stranger Things is officially over. Well, the main series, anyway. Netflix is still putting out the animated midquel series Stranger Things: Tales from ‚Äô85 later this year. But the decade-long wait for an ending for the Hawkins kids is finally over. To some, the series finale seems to have gone over pretty alright. People in my group chat called it ‚Äúfine,‚Äù another said they ‚Äúabsolutely crushed‚Äù it, and another remarked that they ‚Äúdid the best with what they had.‚Äù Those are reactions in private, rather than ones said publicly to get social media engagement, so I wasn‚Äôt surprised when I looked elsewhere and saw people were raking this episode through the coals.

The fifth and final season of Stranger Things has been divisive, as it‚Äôs received criticism for bad, overly simplistic writing and awkward, corny sentimentality. At this point, it‚Äôs entirely possible that the wave of critical reactions could just be bleedover from what many consider a subpar final season, but there have been a few pain points that fans are harping on, whether that be quippy writing, bad performances, or the special effects several people independently compared to those in Linkin Park‚Äôs 25-year-old music video for ‚ÄúIn The End.‚Äù Hell, there are even a few comments in the video‚Äôs YouTube comments referencing the bland, awkward CGI backdrops of some of the finale‚Äôs sequences.

Stranger Things episodio final. pic.twitter.com/XCKAxILzhK

‚Äî Indie 505 (@Indie5051) January 1, 2026

ONE THING, I DONT KNOW WHY https://t.co/5eTYWLnPlv pic.twitter.com/sOLSJTjGIw

‚Äî Bee üêù üá©üá¥ (@SavinTheBees) January 1, 2026

Was going to make a Spy Kids 3D joke but this honestly looks better https://t.co/WBxQX6tHeD pic.twitter.com/HuyeCoqTGJ

‚Äî Jane Altoids (@staticbluebat) January 1, 2026

Linkin Park walked so stranger things could run pic.twitter.com/wnsQJuZNmy

‚Äî vids that go hard (@vidsthatgohard) January 2, 2026

every shot from the stranger things finale looks like this pic.twitter.com/NIJGgJYZSH

‚Äî manic nixon dream girl (@kennixonette) January 2, 2026

The piss-colored, oddly lit CGI of some of the last episode‚Äôs scenes is especially baffling considering Stranger Things‚Äô fifth season is estimated to have a budget rivaling that of blockbuster films like Avengers: Endgame and Avatar. That is, of course, spread across the season‚Äôs eight episodes, but when the climactic otherworldly scenes all look this rough, you gotta wonder what that money was going toward.

Beyond the way the episode looks, the performances of several members of the cast have received some significant criticism, with much of it being directed to Finn Wolfhard. Some fans feel he couldn‚Äôt pull off what were supposed to be the episode‚Äôs biggest emotional swings, such as reacting to the ‚Äúdeath‚Äù of Milly Bobby Brown‚Äôs Eleven, with whom his character has been romantically entangled for most of the show.

you can tell when a nigga just sick and tired of his job LMAOOOO https://t.co/SQdeyEKTNV

‚Äî ‚Ç≠maüßü‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è (@KmaFr_) January 1, 2026

will is losing a sister and mikes mom is taking away his ps5 https://t.co/2TQbIg5Asd

‚Äî ‚Äé Ÿã (@kyoreals) January 1, 2026

me when i accidentally hit my pinky toepic.twitter.com/ucwQ5Vhuvj

‚Äî dhar (@getocausa) January 1, 2026

Finn‚Äôs acting was so bad, people genuinely thought Mike was a repressed homosexual who had feelings for Will while delivering his love confession to El

‚Äî l (@HOLDINGTHECOBRA) January 1, 2026

my cramps are so bad rn im hittin this pose pic.twitter.com/XrjYtsQLxM

‚Äî tina‚ô° (@neonlxnii) January 1, 2026

even his hands can't act https://t.co/SyLroJR8pM

‚Äî MIKE WHEELER MUST DIE (@mitskyuri) January 1, 2026

do u guys think the cast was secretly judging finns acting when they were watching the finale together.. like that must've been awkward as hell right

‚Äî …ê·¥â…Ø | mia | st spoilers (@m1anme) January 2, 2026

Some fans joke that Wolfhard might have just been sick and tired of Stranger Things after what they‚Äôre calling a lackluster final season, but looking at the promo tour, the cast‚Äôs reactions to the final season have faint echoes of the way the Game of Thrones crew talked about the notoriously maligned eighth season before it aired, with some seemingly struggling to keep a straight face when asked if they were happy with the finale. So hey, maybe the Stranger Things kids, too, were suffering at the table read.

YOU GUYS ARE BETTER WRITERS THAN THE DUFFERS IS SO SHADY ACTUALLY LMFAOOOO pic.twitter.com/61PCsM55JR

‚Äî ' (@mayajoes) January 1, 2026

Congrats to Netflix for pulling a Game of Thrones season 8 on their two most popular shows in the same year. pic.twitter.com/5ZKr4mNcHW

‚Äî Rick (@RickDaSquirrel_) January 1, 2026

pic.twitter.com/XAns2JL8MM

‚Äî SB (@SeriesBrasil) January 1, 2026

They should start a podcast pic.twitter.com/dAweybv1ue

‚Äî Someone‚Äôs failed-clone‚Äôs daughter/granddaughter (@MarienneMaid) January 2, 2026

While those criticisms of writing, performance, and SFX are more pointed and specific, the Stranger Things finale also has a lot of the baggage any long-running series that generates fan theories has because some of those hopes and theories didn‚Äôt pan out. The ‚ÄúByler‚Äù community, which has been shipping Mike with his gay best friend Will for years, is having an especially hard time. Though hilariously enough, the writing had become so predictable that even before the episode aired on December 31, fans saw one of the pair‚Äôs final exchanges coming in which, asked by Will if he still wants to be friends, Mike predictably responds that no, he wants to be best friends.

EP 8 LEAK

will : can we still be friends ?
mike : no‚Ä¶
will : oh ok
mike : I don‚Äôt wanna be just friends

*will makes a shocked face and blushes*

mike : I wanna be BEST FRIENDSü•πü•πü•π‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π

‚Äî kellyüêá (@kellysbyler) December 29, 2025

#byler #StrangersThings5 pic.twitter.com/P7Urarx33f

‚Äî somaliaa (@somalianpearl) January 1, 2026

They said Will's sexuality will be important to the plot of the final season but‚Ä¶ it wasn't though. He could've been straight and the plot wouldn't have moved at all. pic.twitter.com/zaTNwSfqgP

‚Äî cee | byler endgame (@bedrot_barbie) January 2, 2026

dgaf about the finale#byler #bylerENDGAME pic.twitter.com/jkfoSDobho

‚Äî fish‚Å∏¬π (@lebermer) January 1, 2026

and no matter how hard they tried to make byler bones they still shine brighter than anyone pic.twitter.com/u2ZMe12CvS

‚Äî …ê…•…î·¥â…Øss (@sssmichaa) January 1, 2026

i‚Äôve been on a journey to try to understand why the shipping community for stranger things genuinely believed all their ships would be true and i‚Äôm realizing it‚Äôs because the actual writers of the show encouraged them to this point the entire way lol https://t.co/7rlIr5B191

‚Äî onion person (@CantEverDie) January 2, 2026

A lot of this noise might just be kneejerk reactions to a finale that didn‚Äôt align with expectations, so it‚Äôs entirely possible that in a few years time, when folks have chilled out, Stranger Things might get a reassessment. If not, it might go down alongside Game of Thrones and How I Met Your Mother as another modern show with an infamously disappointing finale. I guess we‚Äôll see if people show up for Tales from ‚Äò85, but hey, people still loved House of the Dragon despite their issues with Game of Thrones, so maybe there‚Äôs still hope for future Stranger Things, too.

Stranger Things will be the perfect property to study for years to come.

It perfectly encapsulates the decline in storytelling & MCU/Marvelization across Hollywood and Western media over the past 9‚Äì10 years. https://t.co/8RRSTlZxVD

‚Äî An Average Gamer ‚Äì N (@AnAverageGamerX) January 1, 2026



https://kotaku.com/stranger-things-season-5-finale-reaction-byler-acting-2000656424
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: ASUS Goes All-In on Gaming Handheld Console, ROG Xbox Ally 7‚Ä≥ Hits a Record Low as 2026 Begins
item.content:encoded:
Tired of being forced to sit by your computer if you want to play your favorite games? A portable PC like the Steam Deck is a great alternative. But that‚Äôs not the only gig in town. The ASUS ROG Xbox Ally 7‚Ä≥ FHD Gaming Handheld Console is a great alternative, and you can get one for a great price right now.

In fact, you can get it at Amazon for the time being for for $909.99 (a savings of $90 and approximately a 9% discount) versus its typical retail price of $999.99. That‚Äôs not too shabby.

See at Amazon

A flexible portable PC that can play all your favorite games

This isn‚Äôt in any way a budget handheld, so it‚Äôs premium in just about every way. It has a 7-inch full HD resolution display that can make all your favorite titles super bright and detailed, and you get plenty of screen real estate. Regardless of whether you‚Äôre playing action-packed video games, exploring vast open world RPGs, or participating in fast-paced racing games, the display provides crystal-clear images and vibrant colors.

One of the main advantages of the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally is its processing performance. It has a powerful processor for (very necessary) graphics capabilities, so it can run all the latest games. That means you‚Äôll notice smooth frame rates and quick response times, which are important when you‚Äôre fighting in action games, performing combos, or competing in timed matches. Performance also allows for multitasking, enabling you to easily transition between video games, applications and media content, without having to deal with slow-down due to lag.

A common problem associated with handheld gaming devices is battery life. Luckily, the. ROG Xbox Ally provides you with sufficient battery life for multiple gaming sessions before needing to be charged again. In addition to this, when you do need to charge the device, the included AC power adapter will recharge the battery quickly, so you don‚Äôt spend a lot of time waiting for it to fully charge and then resume your gaming session.

Overall, the combination of the ROG Xbox Ally‚Äôs powerful performance, sharp display, and comfortable controls positions it as a premium handheld gaming system suitable for serious gamers. It‚Äôs also a fantastic alternative to the Steam Deck that isn‚Äôt beholden to the constraints of the Steam platform.

All you have to do is make sure you grab one now that it‚Äôs gone down in price. For just $909.99 on Amazon (from the regular price of $999.99), it‚Äôs one of the best picks you can get right now in terms of both portability and power so that you can play your favorite games wherever you go.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/asus-goes-all-in-on-gaming-handheld-console-rog-xbox-ally-7-hits-a-record-low-as-2026-begins-2000656361

item.title: Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 Drop to All-Time Low to Start the New Year, Now Priced Like Older Models Despite Being 2025‚Äôs Latest ANC Earbuds
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a new set of earbuds that sound absolutely fantastic? If money is a concern, you should skip some of the more expensive models and try the Google Pixel Buds Pro 2. They‚Äôll offer some extra sound for the price and some serious oomph. All you have to do is lock yours in before they‚Äôre no longer on sale.

You can get the Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 at Amazon for $179 right now. That‚Äôs $50 less than the typical $229 price. That represents a $50 discount and a savings of about 22% compared to retail.

See at Amazon

Excellent, comfortable earbuds with great noise cancellation

These earbuds are extremely light with soft ear tips, so they‚Äôre comfortable to wear for long periods of time. They‚Äôre able to seal the ear canal better than other earbuds of this caliber, which gives you more bass and more accurate midrange sounds, so you can turn the volume back down and still be able to enjoy your music.

Fast songs sound alive, so to speak, with clean and distinct vocals. Even complex song mixes sound clear, with podcasts and audiobooks are also a pleasure to listen to because voices sound very natural and easy to understand.

Noise cancellation is another feature that helps you concentrate on whatever you‚Äôre listening to by blocking out surrounding distractions such as street noise, conversation, or train noises, allowing you to be able to listen to your audio at lower volumes. With Transparency Mode, you can also listen to ambient noise by allowing the surrounding environment to seep into the earbuds, to let you to hear traffic, or talking if you need to make sure you know what‚Äôs going on around you.

The battery life is excellent for wireless earbuds and gives you plenty of hours of playback per charge. The charging case is also a bonus as it gives you additional power when needed and also serves as a portable charging station, allowing you to charge the earbuds on-the-go via a USB-C cable or wireless charging pad.

Additionally, the Pixel Buds Pro 2 work seamlessly with applications and intelligent features that make customizing your experience easy. You can fine-tune sound settings, configure the earbuds‚Äô controls, and even upgrade the earbuds‚Äô firmware remotely. That alone saves some precious time where you need it the most.

For under $200, the Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 are super affordable and a great option if you want good audio. Give them a try and save some serious cash while reaping the benefits of excellent earbuds.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/google-pixel-buds-pro-2-drop-to-all-time-low-to-start-the-new-year-now-priced-like-older-models-despite-being-2025s-latest-anc-earbuds-2000656364
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Marvel‚Äôs Next Big Show Finally Has A Trailer Well Worth Watching
item.content:encoded:
Marvel‚Äôs Wonder Man finally arrives on Disney+ January 27, and somewhat belatedly has received a trailer that actually gives us an idea of the show. And it looks really good! The new trailer, that introduces the three main characters, is delivered with wit and‚Äîat last‚Äîsome action. We‚Äôve got Wonder Man himself Simon Williams (Yahya Abdul-Mateen II), former Iron Man fake terrorist Trevor Slattery (Ben Kingsley), and maverick director Von Kovak (Zlatko Buric), in a program that intends to send up the production of superhero movies, while telling a superhero story of its own.

Previous trailers have been weirdly shy of showing Simon Williams at all, instead peculiarly focusing on the secondary leads, and absolutely avoiding showing even a hint of Wonder Man‚Äôs wonder. Thank goodness that‚Äôs now over. The promo playfully riffs on Rossini‚Äôs The Barber of Seville, introducing us to the main players, and then at long last setting up the actual ongoing story of the show. Things begin with Williams auditioning to play Wonder Man in a remake of a (fictional) 1970s cult hit, while hiding the fact that he himself has superpowers. The director of the movie is the eccentric Von Kovak, a former Oscar winner now lowering himself to the popularism and tired field of superhero movies in an attempt to revive the genre. Meanwhile, actual Oscar winner Ben Kingsley reprises his role of Trevor, the actor hired to play terrorist Mandarin in Iron Man 3, who then also appeared in Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, as well as his own one-shot All Hail the King.

We get to see Williams‚Äô powers appearing, from his purple sparkles in his eyes (perhaps rather unfortunately reminiscent of DC‚Äôs Black Lightning), and then an awful lot of rumbling, wobbling rooms, and explodifying a table.

I‚Äôve not quite known what to think before now, mostly because the preview coverage has seemed so afraid to show us Wonder Man at all, making me suspicious it was trying to hide something. But seeing Abdul-Mateen II at last shows anything but. The actor, best known for playing Manta in the Aquaman movies and Morpheus in the lackluster The Matrix Resurrections, demonstrates excellent comedy chops in the short clips.

There‚Äôs only a few weeks left to find out if it all comes together, and if Marvel can add a new compelling live-action Disney+ show to its slate following eight months of nothing, to accompany last year‚Äôs splendid Daredevil: Born Again, but following the confused and disappointing Ironheart.



https://kotaku.com/marvels-wonder-man-trailer-ben-kingsley-disney-plus-2000656416
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot
